explains: n. 克罗地亚人；克罗地亚语

sentences.en: "I was serving great," the beaming Croat said.
sentences.cn: “我的发球太强大了，”喜不自禁的克罗地亚人说道。

sentences.en: A Croat heads a new Balkan regional group based in Sarajevo.
sentences.cn: 克罗地亚人领导着一个总部设在萨拉热窝的新巴尔干地区组织。

sentences.en: Even more worrying is the troubled Bosniak-Croat federation.
sentences.cn: 甚至更多的担忧是来自于有诸多问题存在着的波黑联邦。
